title: Angular momentum - disk moving near point

content.prompt: A disk slides with constant velocity on a horizontal surface, as shown in the top-view figure. Friction forces between the disk and the surface are negligible. Which of the following statements correctly describes the angular momentum of the disk relative to Point P ?

choices.label: The angular momentum is constant and zero.
The angular momentum is constant and greater than zero.

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
